Bulipe Tech is a dynamic and innovative company
Bulipe Tech is a dynamic and innovative company that offers a comprehensive suite of
career-focused skill development programs which address various needs within the
technology sector. Additionally, we customized our programs to help individuals upskill or
reskill their professional skills for career growth. Bulipe Tech aims to be a driving force in the
IT industry and a valuable resource for career-minded professionals. ABOUT US
Build Your Career with Us
Bulipe Tech was established with a vision to address unemployment, poverty, and economic
inequality among the population by implementing an innovative digital skill development
initiative to train over 10 million people in the coming years. We aim to enable individuals by
providing essential education through a blended learning model that incorporates both
theoretical knowledge and practical training. We help learners gain skills through interactive
sessions, real-world projects, and multimedia classrooms. We also provide globally
accredited and valuable certificates that ensure quality employment opportunities for our
trainees. Bulipe Tech ultimately aims to eliminate unemployment in Bangladesh and create a
path for underserved communities, enabling them to achieve self-sufficiency in a globalized
environment. LOCATIONS

01.What Courses/Training Programs Do You Offer? Bulipe offers two main training programs: the Digital Skills Development Program, which
provides foundational courses in IT support, digital marketing, and more for entry-level roles,
and the Advanced Skills Development Program, which focuses on specialized fields like app
development, data science, and AI for those aiming to deepen their expertise and advance
in high-demand industries. 02.Do Your Courses Have Accreditation? Yes, Bulipe’s training programs are designed to meet global industry standards, and we
collaborate with renowned accreditation bodies to provide internationally recognized
certifications upon course completion. Our certifications are widely accepted and enhance
job prospects for participants. 03.How Can I Register for a Course in a Bulipe Training Center? Registration for Bulipe’s courses can be done easily through our
website(https://dsdp.bulipetech.com/) or app. Choose your desired course, and follow the
enrollment steps to secure your place. 04.What Are the Fees for our Courses?

For courses under the Digital Skills Development Program, the enrollment fee is BDT
30,000. For the Advanced Skills Development Program, a monthly fee of BDT 30,000
applies. These fees ensure the continued quality and sustainability of our training programs,
which are designed to provide learners with both foundational and specialized expertise in
various digital fields. 07.Will I Get Any Job Placement Assistance? Yes, we provide job placement assistance for all Bulipe trainee graduates. Through our
extensive alumni network and partnerships with over 300+ global businesses across Europe,
America, Asia, and Africa, we guarantee confirmed job prospects and a base salary of BDT
30,000.
